roleset.name: give worth to
roleset.note: DIGNIFY-V NOTES: More commonly arg2 is an NP: 'I won't dignify that with a response.' (from dignify.01-v)

example.name: arg2 as sentence
example.text: ``I-1 hate [*-1] to dignify the publication by commenting on the obscene rating,'' Mayor Carolyn Robinson says, adding that cities have no way to rebut the book.
example.arg: by commenting on the obscene rating
